sentences: Scott Harding, sometimes credited as Scotty Hard, is a Canadian producer and musician who is based in New York City and who has worked in underground hip-hop and jazz.
He came to prominence as a producer for the WordSound label, which released his debut album Return of Kill Dog E in 1999.

His second solo album, Scotty Hard's Radical Reconstructive Surgery (2006), was an outright jazz album released by Thirsty Ear and featuring Harding producing and remixing "an amazing all-star group".
In February 2008, Harding was seriously injured in a car accident in Brooklyn.
He suffered spinal damage and now uses a wheelchair, but he continues to work in music.
